titles.title: Spirit of God, Descend upon My Heart

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Hast Thou not bid us love Thee, God and King? All, all Thine own, soul, heart and strength and mind. I see Thy cross--there teach my heart to cling: O let me seek Thee, and O let me find!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Teach me to love Thee as Thine angels love, One holy passion filling all my frame; The baptism of the heav'n-descended Dove, My heart an altar, and Thy love the flame. Amen.
